creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: two panels sewn together; tan with white, light blue and indigo stripes, and indigo and white ikat-motif stripes
medium: Cotton; plain weave, embroidery, resist dye (jaspe) ikat
signed: near one corner, in pink thread: [L Y (?--backwards C)]
title: Cloth (tzute)
